metadata.title: CVE-2022-48826 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/vc4: Fix deadlock on DSI device attach errorDSI device attach to DSI host will be done with host device's lockheld.Un-registering host in "device attach" error path (ex: probe retry)will result in deadlock with below call trace and non operationalDSI display.Startup Call trace:[   35.043036]
